bow: formula rant am unable to breastfeed there said it not ashamed gave it 110 but in the end it was enough my daughter was gaining weight developed an awful infection and it was affecting my bonding with my child so now she on formula she eats and is happy she thriving and alert it was the best decision however the hatred among formula is so thick it intimidating to feed her in public for fear of backlash get that breast milk is best understand that it the perfect food for the baby but it out of the cards for us so why does it seem like everywhere go there something or someone trying to shove it down my throat even some formula literature picked up at the dr office has breast is best all over it that seems incredibly insensitive to people who ca breastfeed not want to am being overly sensitive no your not keep getting the same was like you just was not bonding breast milk is not perfect it does not have vitamin breast is best is not best for everyone if it works for you great but it did not me and it was my choice my daughter is also happy healthy and thriving at months she is sitting up army crawling and is smarty pants whoever gave you bossypants is genius that person saved my life over and over for the first three months of my child life was terrified of breastfeeding in public think new mothers are sensitive no matter the circumstances hun was the same was so determined that would be viewed as failure if did that put too much pressure on myself and it affected my bond with my baby he now 14months has been walking since 11 months and has so far been strong and healthy and is the centre of my world had community midwife that caused the pressure she made me believe it was easy natural and wonderful and that would only bond with my baby through breast feeding load of nonsense will try to breastfeed the next baby have because do think if you can you should try but am not ashamed to say will use formula if need to no you re not being over sensitive it is annoying that there is stigma to it and nobody seems to consider the depression it can cause to woman who would if she could think the bond between you and your baby is the most important thing there is you re not being over sensitive ve been there my milk supply never came in so while could feed my son about an ounce or so most of his nutrition came from formula still wince whenever hear someone rail against formula or see breast is best on everything even though know did what was best for my son but here the thing as mom pretty much every action you take is held up to scrutiny how you feed your child whether you co sleep how you discipline your child whether or where you send them to preschool it all out there and people think it is okay to judge you for it because it all for the good of the child you know as you get more experienced at parenting you will develop more confidence and will be less vulnerable to these criticisms was unable to give my baby breast milk we tried but he was in the nicu and we were able to work on latching then the lc here is very helpful making it even more stressful when asking for advice so we tried pumping which was successful for two days and then my supply was down to half an ounce and started to feel like failure this was no good we had him on formula which caused him to become constipated causing me to feel horrible because he was pooping perfectly with my milk held my breath when the doc asked if was breast feeding because know there is stigma with formula but then realized there is stigma with both so why care my baby is now on better formula poops like champ and he happy and healthy that all that matters in the end you re sanity is worth more when you re happy and they re happy too hope this helps it is funny you say that because get shy breastfeeding in public there is such stigma about feeding in public feel weird not giving bottle you have to do what is good for you could handle breastfeeding my first so for
